name: Super Granny 5
storyline:
Granny relaxes in the yard with her feline friends when, out of the depths of the basement, her nemesis Dr. Meow appears with an evil new scheme: He created a powerful shrink ray to turn Granny into a pint-sized person. Faster than she can say meow mix, he zaps her with it, and now the diminutive Granny finds herself in a whole new predicament.
Help Granny journey through the dangerous wilderness of her own backyard and find a way back to normal size.
summary:
Take an all-new backyard adventure with Super Granny 5, and experience the fun of the fantastic action series.
Take on over 130 new challenging levels as you run, dig and climb to collect kitties and avoid gran-eating enemies. Collect interactive items, use helpful power-ups and earn special achievements. With the free level editor, you can even create your very own challenges for never-ending fun!
